structure.unit: ARTICLE XVIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY EXPRESSWAY AUTHORITY

text.section:
Sec. 2-130. Officers; quorum.
The Authority shall elect one (1) of its members as its chairperson and shall elect a secretary and a treasurer who need not be members of the Authority. The chairperson, secretary and treasurer shall hold their offices at the will of the Authority. A simple majority of the Authority shall constitute a quorum, and a vote of the majority of those members present shall be necessary for the Authority to take any action. A vacancy on the governing body of the Authority shall not impair the right of a quorum to exercise all rights and perform all of the duties of the Authority.
